programme.title: Memories of the Sword
programme.desc: A young woman trains in secret to slay the general who killed her parents.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: A North Korean agent tries to uncover the secrets hidden inside the eyeglasses of a dead man.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: A laborer moves to Shanghai to become rich, and has to use his kung-fu skills to survive.

programme.title: Crazy Fist
programme.desc: To uncover the truth about his friend’s death, a retired MMA champion returns to the ring.

programme.title: Day Zero
programme.desc: Ex-soldier escapes prison into a virus-plagued world, racing undead hordes to reunite with family.

programme.title: The Rise of Hero
programme.desc: Wong Fei Hung travels to Guangzhou and discovers a conspiracy involving city leaders.
